Class DirectoryListingInstaller

java.lang.Object
org.crosswire.jsword.book.AbstractBookList

com.tyndalehouse.step.core.data.DirectoryListingInstaller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<org.crosswire.jsword.book.install.sword.AbstractSwordInstaller>, org.crosswire.jsword.book.BookList, org.crosswire.jsword.book.install.Installer
public class DirectoryListingInstaller extends DirectoryInstaller
Bases the list of books based on the directory listing of a particular folder, as opposed to a zip file of some kind.

    • reloadBookList

      public void reloadBookList() throws org.crosswire.jsword.book.install.InstallException
      Description copied from interface: org.crosswire.jsword.book.install.Installer
      Re-fetch a list of names from the remote source. It would make sense if the user was warned about the implications of this action. If the user lives in a country that persecutes Christians then this action might give the game away.
